DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying blood sample cancer patient undergo pain treatment laboratory may help doctor learn pain drug work body . It may also help doctor predict patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This research study look fentanyl patient cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To describe pharmacokinetics prolonged intravenous infusion fentanyl citrate adult patient cancer . OUTLINE : Patients undergo blood sample collection discontinuation fentanyl citrate therapy ( 10 day total ) . Pharmacokinetic analysis perform sample .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis cancer Inpatient Johns Hopkins Hospital Cancer Center undergo pain treatment continuous infusion fentanyl citrate ≥ 5 day PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Willing change alternative opioid PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics At least 72 hour since transdermal fentanyl citrate administration At least 12 hour since transmucosal fentanyl citrate administration No known requirement continue opioid therapy fentanyl citrate product discontinuation fentanyl citrate therapy
